name: Hop Sky,Go! - Test your Fast Reaction
name_original: Hop Sky,Go! - Test your Fast Reaction
description:
‘Hop Sky,Go!’ is a endless running adventure game that requires your fast reactions.
Help these different animals run as far as possible on the single-plank bridge without dying.
Sound so easy?No!It's speed is increase when running,and the bridge is tortuous.
So click on the scrren at the right time to make the animal turn.
If you click early or late, the animal will fall down!

Collect the rainbows and the fruits to get more high score.
Tap to turn!See how far you can run.Have fun!
